text: Dwight Ball (born December 21, 1957) is a Canadian politician. He was the 13th Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador from December 14, 2015 until August 19, 2020 and an MHA. On January 3, 2012, Ball began his duties as Leader of the Official Opposition and interim leader of the Liberal Party. On November 30, 2015, Ball won a 31-seat majority government in the 2015 election. ==References== ==Other websites== * Dwight Ball Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of Newfoundland and Labrador
title: Dwight Ball
